prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for PA Farm Show Complex (venue_uid=pant-venue)","Location":"city: Harrisburg city_uid=harrisburg, state:PA state_uid=pa.","GEO context":"lat=40.2858907, lon=-76.8831769 placeid=EjAyMzAwIE4gQ2FtZXJvbiBTdCAjMmMsIEhhcnJpc2J1cmcsIFBBIDE3MTEwLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCbsGOPwtwciJEaAbjnng9YojEgIyYw.","Official venue link":"https://panational.org/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://panational.org/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "pant-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Pennsylvania National Horse Show — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "PNHS in Harrisburg runs like a true indoor championship: a polished main ring with crisp ingate calls, a separate schooling ring with posted drags, and stabling that’s walkable to everything. Expect tight ring flow, clear jog strip instructions, and a compact vendor row for last-minute fixes. Plan your hack routes, hit the warm-up ring early, and keep an eye on the board so your flat, fences, and jog timing stays on point. Pack layers—temps inside are comfortable, but concourses and barns can feel chilly during fall load-in and late classes.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Pennsylvania National Horse Show",
    "PNHS",
    "Harrisburg PA",
    "Farm Show Complex",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "derbies",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your PNHS week",
  "section_img": "https://panational.org/wp-content/uploads/pnhs-venue-hero.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "PNHS main ring inside the Pennsylvania Farm Show Complex with spectators on the concourse",
  "section_link": "https://panational.org/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for the Pennsylvania National Horse Show in Harrisburg—warm-up ring flow, jog strip details, vendor row, and stabling tips for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "PNHS — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Practical notes on warm-up, the jog strip, vendor row, stabling, footing/drags, and logistics so you can move efficiently at the Pennsylvania National Horse Show.",
  "section_search_title": "Pennsylvania National Horse Show Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative rider-focused overview of PNHS at the Farm Show Complex: warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, footing, and show-day logistics.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for PNHS",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up: traffic stacks up before eq and junior jumper blocks—flat early and call lines with the ingate.",
      "Ring flow: allow 5–10 minutes from stabling to the main ring; concourse pinch points can slow carts.",
      "Jog strip: tack tidy, number visible—arrive early with a towel and hoof oil for quick touch-ups.",
      "Vendor row: fast fixes—studs, spur straps, gloves, and braiding yarn; mobile repairs between trips.",
      "Stabling: permanent stalls—keep trunks flush, fans secured, and hoses coiled to ease busy aisles.",
      "Footing & drags: intervals are posted—time your last schools to land right after a drag.",
      "Course walks: access is timed—carry a ring bag (hole punch, zip ties, tape, rub rag) to save trips.",
      "Badges & doors: credentials checked at arena access points—keep wristbands handy to avoid delays.",
      "Weather watch: fall swings from crisp to damp—pack coolers and conservative studs after rain.",
      "Pro tip: text the barn when you’re 10 out so your horse hits the jog strip polished but relaxed."
    ]
  }
}

  "venue_uid": "pant-venue",

venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
